trans-unit.source: Represents a UI Automation element in the UI Automation tree, and contains values used as identifiers by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 代表使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄中的使用者介面自動化項目，並包含可由使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式當成識別項來使用的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> corresponds to a piece of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], regardless of underlying implementation (such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>對應於一段[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，而不論基礎實作 (例如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AcceleratorKey" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AcceleratorKey" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可以從擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Accelerator key combinations invoke an action.
trans-unit.target: 快速鍵組合來叫用動作。

trans-unit.source: For example, CTRL+O is often used to invoke the **Open** file common dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 例如，CTRL + O 通常用來叫用**開啟**通用對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that has the accelerator key property set always implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> ，有快速鍵按鍵屬性設定一律實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern>類別。

trans-unit.source: Return values of the property are of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the property is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is returned if the element does not provide one.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property, but specifies that if the element itself does not provide a value for the property, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported> is to be returned instead of a default value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值，但如果項目本身不提供屬性的值，指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported>會傳回而不是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AccessKey" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AccessKey" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可以從擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An access key is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that activates the attached menu function.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵是中的功能表、 功能表項目或可啟動附加的功能表功能按鈕等控制項的標籤文字的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter "O" is often used to invoke the **File Open** common dialog box from a **File** menu.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果找到字母"O"通常用來叫用**開啟舊檔**通用對話方塊中，從**檔案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: Access key values are of type <xref:System.String> and contain the character registered as the access key for the element.
trans-unit.target: 存取金鑰值屬於型別<xref:System.String>，而且包含註冊項目的存取金鑰為字元。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the string is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 字串的預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is returned if the element does not provide one.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property, but specifies that if the element itself does not provide a value for the property, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported> is to be returned instead of a default value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值，但如果項目本身不提供屬性的值，指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported>會傳回而不是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies an event raised during asynchronous content-loading.
trans-unit.target: 識別非同步內容載入期間引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: This event is used mainly by providers to indicate that asynchronous content-loading events have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件主要是由提供者用於表示發生了非同步內容載入事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies an event that is raised when the focus has changed.
trans-unit.target: 識別變更焦點時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId" /> property, which is used to identify elements.
trans-unit.target: 識別用來識別元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可以從擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Return values of the property are of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the property is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: When it is available the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationIdProperty> of an element is expected to always be the same in any instance of the application regardless of the local language.
trans-unit.target: 當有<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationIdProperty>項目的預期保持不變，不論本機語言應用程式的任何執行個體中。

trans-unit.source: The value should be unique among sibling elements but not necessarily unique across the entire desktop.
trans-unit.target: 值應該是整個桌面同層級項目中的唯一性，但不是一定是唯一。

trans-unit.source: For example, multiple instances of an application, or multiple folder views in Microsoft Windows Explorer, may contain elements with the same <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationIdProperty>, such as "SystemMenuBar".
trans-unit.target: 例如，多個執行個體的應用程式或在 Microsoft Windows 檔案總管 中的多個資料夾檢視可能包含具有相同的項目<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationIdProperty>，例如"SystemMenuBar"。

trans-unit.source: While support of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId%2A> is always recommended for better testability, this property is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: 雖然支援<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId%2A>一律建議更好的測試能力，這個屬性不是強制性。

trans-unit.source: Where it is supported, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId%2A> is useful for creating test automation scripts that run regardless of UI language.
trans-unit.target: 支援，where<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId%2A>建立測試自動化指令碼的 UI 語言不論執行的是很有用。

trans-unit.source: Clients should make no assumptions regarding the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId%2A>s exposed by other applications.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應該作任何假設有關<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId%2A>s 由其他應用程式。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId%2A> is not necessarily guaranteed to be stable across different releases or builds of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.AutomationId%2A>一定不保證能夠穩定跨不同的版本，或應用程式的組建。

trans-unit.source: Instances of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are uniquely identified on the desktop by their <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]項目中可唯一識別在桌面上依其<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationIdProperty> is supported by all UI Automation elements in the control view except top-level application windows, UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls that do not have an ID or x:Uid, and UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] controls that do not have a control ID.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationIdProperty> 支援的最上層的應用程式視窗、 衍生自使用者介面自動化項目以外的控制項檢視中的所有使用者介面自動化項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]控制項不會有一個識別碼或 X:uid 和使用者介面自動化項目衍生自[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]控制項沒有控制項 id。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is returned if the element does not provide one.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property, but specifies that if the element itself does not provide a value for the property, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported> is to be returned instead of a default value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值，但如果項目本身不提供屬性的值，指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported>會傳回而不是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies a property-changed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別屬性變更的事件。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.BoundingRectangle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.BoundingRectangle" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可以從擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Bounding rectangles are of type <xref:System.Windows.Rect>.
trans-unit.target: 週框矩形屬於類型<xref:System.Windows.Rect>。

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle is in physical screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的矩形是在實際螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> is returned if the item is not currently displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> 如果項目未顯示傳回[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle can contain points that are not clickable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的矩形可以包含沒有任何可點選的點。

trans-unit.source: Instances where this could happen include when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] item has an irregular shape or clickable region, or it is obscured by other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情形的執行個體包含當[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目具有不規則的形狀或可點選區域或遮蔽其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is returned if the element does not provide one.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property, but specifies that if the element itself does not provide a value for the property, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported> is to be returned instead of a default value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值，但如果項目本身不提供屬性的值，指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported>會傳回而不是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 物件的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached property values for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 之快取屬性值的結構。

trans-unit.source: The accessors for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties are represented as properties of the structure returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 存取子[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]屬性所傳回的結構屬性以表示<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to retrieve the structure; you can access its members directly, as in the example below.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要擷取的結構。您可以直接存取其成員，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: For specific information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 特定上可用的屬性以及其用法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation>。

trans-unit.source: To get the current value of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties on this element use the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的目前值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]屬性在這個項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.Name%2A> property can be cached and then retrieved by using the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.Name%2A>可以快取，然後擷取使用屬性<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: There are no cached properties.
trans-unit.target: 沒有快取屬性。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached child elements of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的快取子元素。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection can be empty if the element has no children.
trans-unit.target: 如果該元素沒有子系，則可以是空集合。

trans-unit.source: The view of the returned collection is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.TreeFilter%2A> condition of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> that was active when this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> object was obtained.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回之集合的檢視由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.TreeFilter%2A>條件<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>，活躍時這<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>取得物件。

trans-unit.source: Children are cached only if the scope of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> included <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Subtree>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children>, or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Descendants>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當快取子系範圍<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>包含<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Subtree>， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children>，或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Descendants>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> specified that children were to be cached at this level, but there are no children, then the value of this property is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>指定子系已快取在此層級，但沒有任何子系，則這個屬性的值為 0。

trans-unit.source: However, if no request was made to cache children at this level, an attempt to retrieve the property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果沒有要求的快取子系，在此層級，嘗試擷取屬性就會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a list box element is obtained from the parent window element while a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> is active and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.TreeScope%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children>.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，清單方塊項目取自父視窗項目時<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>為作用中和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.TreeScope%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children>。

trans-unit.source: The specified properties of the child elements (that is, the list items) are stored in the cache and can be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.CachedChildren%2A> of the list box.
trans-unit.target: 指定之屬性的子項目 （也就是清單項目） 會儲存在快取，而且可以從擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.CachedChildren%2A>清單方塊。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: No request was made to cache the children of this element.
trans-unit.target: 未要求快取此項目的子系。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached parent of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的快取父系。

trans-unit.source: The parent element.
trans-unit.target: 父元素。

trans-unit.source: The return value can be <see langword="null" /> if the specified element has no parent—for example, if this element is the root node.
trans-unit.target: 指定的元素如果沒有父系 (例如，此元素是根節點)，則傳回值可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.Name%2A>會快取清單方塊和其清單項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The list box element is available in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.CachedParent%2A> property of each list item element.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊項目位於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.CachedParent%2A>每個清單項目元素的屬性。

trans-unit.source: No parent element is cached.
trans-unit.target: 快取不到任何父項目。

trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: The class name depends on the implementation of the UI Automation provider and therefore cannot be counted upon to be in a standard format.
trans-unit.target: 類別名稱的使用者介面自動化提供者實作而定，因此無法計算時以標準格式。

trans-unit.source: However, if you know the class name you can use it to verify that your application is working with the expected [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您知道類別名稱您可用它來確認您的應用程式的運作與預期[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值，但如果項目本身不提供屬性的值，指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported>會傳回而不是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the culture property.
trans-unit.target: 識別文化特性屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: Within the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework, the default value reported will always be `en-US` because the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfx-md.md)] framework automatically defaults to English.
trans-unit.target: 內[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework 中，報告的預設值一定會`en-US`因為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfx-md.md)]架構會自動預設為英文。

trans-unit.source: For other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] frameworks this property must be explicitly set or it will not be exposed.
trans-unit.target: 適用於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]架構這個屬性必須明確設定，或者不會公開。

trans-unit.source: This property can exist on a per-control basis, but typically is only available on an application level.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以針對每個控制項，存在，但通常上才有提供應用程式層級。

trans-unit.source: Return values of the property are of type <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 目前的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current property values.
trans-unit.target: 包含目前屬性值的結構。

trans-unit.source: The accessors for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties are represented as properties of the structure returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 存取子[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]屬性所傳回的結構屬性以表示<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to retrieve the structure; you can access its members directly, as in the example below.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要擷取的結構。您可以直接存取其成員，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: For specific information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 特定上可用的屬性以及其用法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation>。

trans-unit.source: To get the cached value of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties on this element, use the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的快取的值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]屬性在這個項目，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A> property is used to retrieve the name of an item that has been selected in a list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>屬性用來擷取已在清單中選取之項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> has the same value as this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 是否具有與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 相同的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> is equal to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />;otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 相同；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two elements that compare as equal may contain different cached information from different points in time.
trans-unit.target: 比較為相等的兩個項目可能包含不同的快取的資訊不同時間點的時間。

trans-unit.source: The equality check only tests that the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> objects refer to the same underlying user interface element; that is, that they have the same run-time identifier.
trans-unit.target: 相等檢查只測試，以便<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>物件參考相同的基礎使用者介面項目; 也就是說，它們有相同的執行階段識別項。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the equality operator, which also compare run-time identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於等號比較運算子，這也會比較執行階段識別項。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of values that specifies the scope of the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜尋範圍之值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The object containing the criteria to match.
trans-unit.target: 包含符合準則的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> objects that satisfy the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回滿足指定條件的所有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that satisfies the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 符合指定條件的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matches, an empty collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有符合的成員，則傳回空白集合。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the search is relative to the element on which the method is called.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋範圍是相對於呼叫該方法的項目。

trans-unit.source: Elements are returned in the order in which they were encountered in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 在樹狀目錄中所發生的順序，會傳回項目。

trans-unit.source: When searching for top-level windows on the desktop, be sure to specify <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children> in `scope`, not <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Descendants>.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的桌面上的最上層視窗時，務必指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children>中`scope`，而非<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Descendants>。

trans-unit.source: A search through the entire subtree of the desktop could iterate through thousands of items and lead to a stack overflow.
trans-unit.target: 桌面的整個樹狀子目錄搜尋，可以逐一查看數千個項目，會導致堆疊溢位。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A> to locate all enabled buttons in a window.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A>找出所有已啟用視窗中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of values that specifies the scope of the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜尋範圍之值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The object containing the criteria to match.
trans-unit.target: 包含符合準則的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first child or descendant element that matches the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合指定條件的第一個子項目或子系元素。

trans-unit.source: The first element that satisfies the condition, or <see langword="null" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 符合條件的第一個元素，沒有符合的元素時則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the search is relative to the element on which the method is called.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋範圍是相對於呼叫該方法的項目。

trans-unit.source: When searching for a top-level window on the desktop, be sure to specify <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children> in `scope`, not <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Descendants>.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的桌面上的最上層視窗時，務必指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children>中`scope`，而非<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Descendants>。

trans-unit.source: A search through the entire subtree of the desktop could iterate through thousands of items and lead to a stack overflow.
trans-unit.target: 桌面的整個樹狀子目錄搜尋，可以逐一查看數千個項目，會導致堆疊溢位。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.FrameworkId" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.FrameworkId" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: Return values of the property are of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: This property enables applications to apply special cases to entire UI frameworks.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓特殊案例套用至整個使用者介面架構的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Examples of property values are "Win32", "WinForm", and "DirectUI".
trans-unit.target: 屬性值的範例為"Win32"、"型 WinForm"和"DirectUI"。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The handle of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> object for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item referenced by the specified window handle.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定之視窗控制代碼所參考的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目，擷取一個新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] item identified by <paramref name="hwnd" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="hwnd" /> 識別之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The provider object.
trans-unit.target: 提供者物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> object from a local <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 從本機 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" /> 實作擷取新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> that represents the element served by the provider object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />，代表由提供者物件提供的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method might be used by a client helper library to enable its callers to access its own native element type.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用的用戶端協助程式庫，讓其呼叫端若要存取它自己的原生項目類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses this method internally so that it can return an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to clients that want to get a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element directly from a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]會在內部使用這個方法，好讓它可以傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>給想要取得的用戶端[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目，直接從<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: The physical screen coordinates on the desktop at which to locate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素的桌面實際螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> object for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item at specified point on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 針對位於桌面上所指定點的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目擷取新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] item at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定點的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FromPoint%2A> returns the element in the logical tree that is closest to the root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FromPoint%2A> 傳回的項目邏輯樹狀結構中最接近的根項目。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Although the point is within the bounding rectangle of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>, it is not necessarily on a clickable part of the control.
trans-unit.target: 雖然傳回之週框矩形內的點是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>，就不一定要是控制項可點選的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, a round button might not be clickable near one of the corners of its bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，圓形按鈕可能無法按其周框的角落附近。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> at the system cursor location.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>系統游標的位置。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the pattern to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之模式的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified pattern from the cache of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 從這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的快取擷取指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the specified pattern.
trans-unit.target: 代表所指定模式的物件。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matching patterns, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有符合的模式，會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPattern%2A> retrieves the specified pattern from the cache.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPattern%2A> 從快取擷取指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current object for the specified pattern, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的指定模式比對目前的物件，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the requested pattern was not previously cached.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求的模式未先前快取，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to cache and retrieve a pattern.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何快取並擷取模式。

trans-unit.source: The requested pattern is not in the cache or is not supported by the element.
trans-unit.target: 快取內沒有要求的模式，或項目不支援此模式。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the cached value of the specified property from an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 擷取所指定屬性的已快取值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> retrieves the specified property from the cache of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> 擷取指定之屬性的快取從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current property, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取目前的屬性，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之屬性的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified property from the cache of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 從這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的快取擷取所指定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An appropriate default value for the property type is returned for properties not explicitly supported by the target [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 對於目標 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素未明確支援的屬性，會傳回屬性類型的適當預設值。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 包含所指定屬性之值的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the UI Automation provider for the element itself supports the property, the value of the property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目本身的使用者介面自動化提供者支援的屬性，則會傳回屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a default property specified by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 否則，預設屬性會由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]傳回。

trans-unit.source: For information on default properties, see the property identifier fields of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AcceleratorKeyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 預設屬性的資訊，請參閱屬性的識別項欄位<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AcceleratorKeyProperty>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> retrieves the specified property from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>'s cache.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> 擷取指定的屬性，從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>的快取。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current object for the specified property call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取目前的物件，指定的屬性呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the requested property was not previously cached.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求的屬性未先前快取，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following shows how this method can be used to retrieve a cached property.
trans-unit.target: 以下顯示如何使用這個方法，來擷取快取的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 已不存在。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之屬性的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether a default value should be ignored if the specified property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，它指定若不支援指定的屬性時是否要忽略預設值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified property from the cache of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />, optionally ignoring any default property.
trans-unit.target: 從這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的快取擷取所指定屬性的值，選擇忽略任何預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value of the specified property, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported" /> if the element does not supply a value and <paramref name="ignoreDefaultValue" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含所指定屬性的物件，或者若元素未提供值且 <paramref name="ignoreDefaultValue" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> retrieves the specified property from the cache for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> 擷取指定之屬性的快取從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current property, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取目前的屬性，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Passing `false` in `ignoreDefaultValue` is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%28System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`false`中`ignoreDefaultValue`就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%28System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the UI Automation provider for the element itself supports the property, the value of the property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目本身的使用者介面自動化提供者支援的屬性，則會傳回屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `ignoreDefaultValue` is `false`, a default property specified by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`ignoreDefaultValue`是`false`，由指定的預設屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]傳回。

trans-unit.source: For information on default properties, see the property identifier fields of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AcceleratorKeyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 預設屬性的資訊，請參閱屬性的識別項欄位<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AcceleratorKeyProperty>。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the requested property was not previously cached.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求的屬性未先前快取，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how this method can be used to retrieve a cached property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何使用這個方法，來擷取快取的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a point on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> that can be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在可點按的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上擷取點。

trans-unit.source: The physical screen coordinates of a point that can be used by a client to click on this element.
trans-unit.target: 可由用戶端使用以在此元素上按一下之點的實際螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> is not clickable if it is completely obscured by another window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>不可點選如果完全遮住其他視窗。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> is clickable when it satisfies all the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>時，可按滿足下列所有條件：

trans-unit.source: It is programmatically visible and available with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式顯示，並提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: It is scrolled fully into view within its parent container, if any.
trans-unit.target: 它是完整捲動到檢視範圍內父容器，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: If the element is clipped, there is no guarantee that it is clickable.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目會裁剪，就是可點選不保證。

trans-unit.source: The element is not obscured by any other UI element.
trans-unit.target: 項目不會遮住其他 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: If the element is partially obscured by some UI element other than its ancestors, it might not be clickable.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目會變暗某個 UI 項目，其祖系以外，它可能不能按。

trans-unit.source: The window containing the element must itself be clickable.
trans-unit.target: 包含此項目的視窗本身必須為可點按。

trans-unit.source: For example, the window is not clickable if the containing window is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: 例如，視窗不可點選如果包含視窗是完全透明的。

trans-unit.source: Mouse clicks will click through to the window underneath, so any controls within the transparent window will not return clickable points.
trans-unit.target: 按下滑鼠會按到視窗下方，因此半透明視窗內的任何控制項將不會傳回可點選的點。

trans-unit.source: If the element is a container (such as list or tree view), it must have a point that when clicked will cause the background of the control to be focused.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目 （例如清單或樹狀結構檢視） 的容器，它必須有一個點，當按下將會導致常常控制項的背景。

trans-unit.source: If every part of the container control is occupied by a child element, it is not clickable.
trans-unit.target: 如果子元素所佔據的容器控制項的每個部分，則不可點選。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that a control will do anything when clicked on a point defined as clickable by the UI Automation provider.
trans-unit.target: 沒有控制項將會進行任何定義的點按下時保證為可點按的 UI 自動化提供者。

trans-unit.source: Consider using control patterns instead to perform actions on controls.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮改為使用在控制項上執行動作的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: The following code retrieves a clickable point for a control and moves the system cursor to that point.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會擷取控制項可點選的點，並將系統游標移至該點。

trans-unit.source: There is no clickable point.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可點選的點。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the pattern to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之模式的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified pattern object on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上擷取指定的模式物件。

trans-unit.source: The pattern object, if the specified pattern is currently supported by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 模式物件 (若指定的模式受 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 支援)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> gets the specified pattern based on its availability at the time of the call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> 取得指定的模式，在呼叫時，根據其可用性。

trans-unit.source: For some forms of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], this method will incur cross-process performance overhead.
trans-unit.target: 某些形式的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，這個方法將會造成跨處理序的效能負擔。

trans-unit.source: Applications can concentrate overhead by caching patterns and then retrieving them by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPattern%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以由快取模式與使用擷取負擔專注<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPattern%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>, which is then used to select an item in a list box.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個方法來擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>，然後用來在清單方塊中選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: For often-repeated tasks such as the one in the example, it would be more efficient to cache the pattern and use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPattern%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 經常重複工作，例如此範例中，將快取模式，並使用更有效率<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPattern%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The pattern is not supported by the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目不支援此模式。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current value of the specified property from an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 擷取所指定屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> method is current at the time it is called.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>方法是在呼叫時的最新。

trans-unit.source: The value can subsequently change by other applications interacting with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 值可以後續又變更由其他應用程式與互動[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For some forms of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], this method will incur cross-process performance overhead.
trans-unit.target: 某些形式的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，這個方法將會造成跨處理序的效能負擔。

trans-unit.source: Applications can concentrate overhead by caching properties and then retrieving them by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以快取的屬性，然後擷取它們使用負擔專注<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property identifier specifying which property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 指定要擷取之屬性的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified property on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上擷取所指定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An appropriate default value for the property type is returned for properties not explicitly supported by the target [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 對於目標 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素未明確支援的屬性，會傳回屬性類型的適當預設值。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 包含所指定屬性之值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> method is current at the time it is called.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>方法是在呼叫時的最新。

trans-unit.source: The value can subsequently change by other applications interacting with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 值可以後續又變更由其他應用程式與互動[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If the UI Automation provider for the element itself supports the property, the value of the property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目本身的使用者介面自動化提供者支援的屬性，則會傳回屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a default property specified by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 否則，預設屬性會由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]傳回。

trans-unit.source: For information on default properties, see the property identifier fields of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AcceleratorKeyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 預設屬性的資訊，請參閱屬性的識別項欄位<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AcceleratorKeyProperty>。

trans-unit.source: For some forms of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], this method will incur cross-process performance overhead.
trans-unit.target: 某些形式的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，這個方法將會造成跨處理序的效能負擔。

trans-unit.source: Concentrate overhead by caching properties and then retrieving them by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 額外負荷的快取的屬性，然後將它們擷取使用集中<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.HelpText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取目前的值<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.HelpText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is returned if the element does not provide one.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property identifier specifying which property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 指定要擷取之屬性的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether a default value should be ignored if the specified property is supported.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，它指定若支援指定的屬性時是否應該忽略預設值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified property on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />, optionally ignoring any default property.
trans-unit.target: 在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上擷取所指定屬性的值，選擇性忽略任何預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value of the specified property, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported" /> if the element does not supply a value and <paramref name="ignoreDefaultValue" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含所指定屬性的物件，或者若元素未提供值且 <paramref name="ignoreDefaultValue" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported" />。

trans-unit.source: Passing `false` in `ignoreDefaultValue` is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%28System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`false`中`ignoreDefaultValue`就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%28System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the UI Automation provider for the element itself supports the property, the value of the property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目本身的使用者介面自動化提供者支援的屬性，則會傳回屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `ignoreDefaultValue` is `false`, a default property specified by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`ignoreDefaultValue`是`false`，由指定的預設屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]傳回。

trans-unit.source: For information on default properties, see the property identifier fields of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AcceleratorKeyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 預設屬性的資訊，請參閱屬性的識別項欄位<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AcceleratorKeyProperty>。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> method is current at the time it is called.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>方法是在呼叫時的最新。

trans-unit.source: The value can subsequently change by other applications interacting with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 值可以後續又變更由其他應用程式與互動[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For some forms of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], this method will incur cross-process performance overhead.
trans-unit.target: 某些形式的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，這個方法將會造成跨處理序的效能負擔。

trans-unit.source: Applications can concentrate overhead by caching properties and then retrieving them by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以快取的屬性，然後擷取它們使用負擔專注<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.HelpText%2A> property, but specifies that if the element itself does not provide a value for the property, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported> is to be returned instead of a default value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取目前的值<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.HelpText%2A>屬性，但指定的項目本身不提供屬性的值，如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported>會傳回而不是預設值。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the unique identifier assigned to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item.
trans-unit.target: 擷取已指派給 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers representing the run-time identifier.
trans-unit.target: 代表執行階段識別碼的整數陣列。

trans-unit.source: The identifier is only guaranteed to be unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the desktop on which it was generated.
trans-unit.target: 只保證是唯一的識別項[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]它所產生的桌面。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers can be reused over time.
trans-unit.target: 經過一段時間可重複使用識別項。

trans-unit.source: The format of run-time identifiers might change in future releases.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段識別項的格式可能會變更在未來的版本。

trans-unit.source: The returned identifier should be treated as an opaque value and used only for comparison; for example, to determine whether an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> is in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的識別項應該視為不透明值，並僅用於比較;例如，若要判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>快取中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the run-time identifier of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取執行階段識別項的<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the control patterns that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> supports.
trans-unit.target: 擷取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 支援的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern" /> objects that represent the supported control patterns.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern" /> 物件陣列，代表支援的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: This method would typically be used for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常會用於偵錯。

trans-unit.source: Calling it requires a great deal of processing, as it queries the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> for every possible pattern.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫它，則需要大量處理，因為它會查詢<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>的每個可能的模式。

trans-unit.source: Normally you would use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve a specific control pattern from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>擷取特定的控制項模式，從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。

trans-unit.source: To ascertain whether a particular pattern is supported, check the appropriate property; for example, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsWindowPatternAvailableProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定是否支援特定的模式，請檢查適當的屬性;例如， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsWindowPatternAvailableProperty>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the control patterns supported by an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取控制項模式支援<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the identifiers of properties supported by the element.
trans-unit.target: 擷取元素支援之屬性的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An array of supported property identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 支援之屬性識別碼的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The returned array identifies all the properties supported by this element; however, it can also contain duplicate entries or properties that contain `null` or empty values.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的陣列識別此項目; 支援的所有屬性不過，它也可以包含重複的項目或屬性包含`null`或空值。

trans-unit.source: For most purposes it is better to use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> to determine whether a property is currently supported and to get its current value.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的用途是較好的方式使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>來判斷是否目前支援的屬性，以及取得其目前值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the properties supported by an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取所支援的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。

trans-unit.source: The patterns and properties to include in the updated cache.
trans-unit.target: 要包含在已更新之快取中的模式與屬性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> with an updated cache.
trans-unit.target: 擷取具有已更新之快取的新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> that has an updated cache.
trans-unit.target: 具有已更新之快取的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 原始<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>保持不變。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetUpdatedCache%2A> returns a new <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>, that refers to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] and has the same <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetUpdatedCache%2A> 傳回新<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>，它會參考相同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]和具有相同的<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how a cache might be updated whenever the selection in a combo box changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何快取可能會更新在下拉式方塊中的選取項目變更時。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.HasKeyboardFocus" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.HasKeyboardFocus" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: Return values of the property are of type <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設值是`false`。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is returned if the element does not provide one.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.HelpText" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.HelpText" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可以從擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This information is typically obtained from tooltips specified by providers.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊通常被取自提供者所指定的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Return values of the property are of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the property is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.target: 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.IsContentElement" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可以從擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree provides a view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] that only contains elements that represent data within the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: An element must be a control to be able to hold content.
trans-unit.target: 項目必須是能夠將保存內容控制項。

trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the property is `true`.

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值，但如果項目本身不提供屬性的值，指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported>會傳回而不是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.IsControlElement" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.IsControlElement" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.Cached%2A> properties.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by a container of elements whenever the visibility information of many elements has changed.
trans-unit.target: 每當多個項目的可見性資訊已變更，則項目的容器會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by the client as an indicator that it needs to refresh the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.BoundingRectangleProperty> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsOffscreenProperty> information that it may have cached for elements within the tree.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端會使用此事件為指標，以便重新整理<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.BoundingRectangleProperty>和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsOffscreenProperty>它可能已快取的項目樹狀結構中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The recommended number of changes that triggers this event is 25.
trans-unit.target: 建議的數目的變更會觸發這個事件是 25。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> objects refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回一個值，這個值指出指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 物件是否參考相同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> objects refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] element; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 物件參考相同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" /> 。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> objects that compare as equal might contain different cached information from different points in time.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>比較為相等的物件可能包含不同的快取的資訊不同時間點的時間。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.op_Equality%2A> only tests that the objects refer to the same underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.op_Equality%2A> 僅測試這些物件參考相同的基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> objects refer to different [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 物件是否參考不同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two objects refer to different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements; otherwise <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> for the current desktop.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前桌面的根 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The root element.
trans-unit.target: 根項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use the root element as a starting point for finding other elements, using the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindFirst%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的根項目做為起點來尋找其他項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindFirst%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When searching from the root element, be sure to specify <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children> in the scope of the search, not <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Descendants>.
trans-unit.target: 當您搜尋從根項目，請務必指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Children>中搜尋的範圍不<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope.Descendants>。

trans-unit.source: A search through the entire subtree of the desktop could iterate through thousands of items and lead to a stack overflow.
trans-unit.target: 桌面的整個樹狀子目錄搜尋，可以逐一查看數千個項目，會導致堆疊溢位。

trans-unit.source: The following example code retrieves a collection of all the immediate children of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼擷取所有直接子系，桌面的集合。

trans-unit.target: 將焦點設在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method depends on the implementation by the UI Automation provider for the element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的行為取決於項目的使用者介面自動化提供者所實作。

trans-unit.source: Setting focus does not necessarily bring the element to the foreground or make it visible.
trans-unit.target: 設定焦點不會不一定帶到前景的項目，或讓它顯示。

trans-unit.source: The UI for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的 UI 不再存在。

trans-unit.target: 識別工具提示開啟時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Tooltips are transitory on the desktop, and the tooltip might have closed by the time the client receives the event.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示會在桌面上，暫時性和工具提示可能已經關閉用戶端接收事件的時間。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the control pattern to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之控制項模式的識別項。

trans-unit.source: On return, contains the pattern if it is in the cache; otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回時，如果快取中有該模式則包含該模式；否則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a control pattern from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 從快取擷取控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the pattern is in the cache; <see langword="false" /> if it is not in the cache or not supported.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示快取中有該模式，<see langword="false" /> 表示快取中沒有該模式或不支援該模式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to cache and retrieve a control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何快取並擷取控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the physical screen coordinates of a clickable point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，會包含可按點的實際螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a point within the element that can be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 擷取可按元素內的一個點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is a point that is clickable; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示此點可按；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> is not clickable if it is completely obscured by another window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>不可點選如果完全遮住其他視窗。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to retrieve a clickable point on an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試擷取可點選的點上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the control pattern to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之控制項模式的識別項。

trans-unit.source: On return, the control pattern if it is supported; otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回時，如果支援則為控制項模式；否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that implements a control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 擷取實作控制項模式的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the pattern is supported; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示支援該模式，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For some forms of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], this method will incur cross-process performance overhead.
trans-unit.target: 某些形式的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，這個方法將會造成跨處理序的效能負擔。

trans-unit.source: Applications can concentrate overhead by caching patterns and then retrieving them by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPattern%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以由快取模式與使用擷取負擔專注<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPattern%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to retrieve a control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個方法來擷取控制項模式。
